about_the_game:
DiamondFalls is a captivating and challenging match-3 puzzle game for enthusiasts of the genre. Players must solve each puzzle by collecting all diamonds and balls of the same color in a specific order within a limited amount of time. The puzzle features numerous interactive objects that change state based on various influences and game situations. Stones, bombs, diamonds, and balls all fall under the influence of gravity, making each level unique and engaging.
The game boasts stunning visuals, immersive sound effects, and an elaborate interface, ensuring players are thoroughly entertained throughout their DiamondFalls experience. The levels feature advanced logic puzzles that require strategic thinking and quick reflexes, adding an extra layer of excitement to the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz with 4 logical CPU cores.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 1Gb video memory and support shader model 4.0
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any (OpenAL compatible)
  • Additional Notes: Steam Offline Mode - unsupported; XInput 9.1.0 for support XBox controller - Optional;
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz with 4+ logical CPU cores.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any with 2Gb video memory and support shader model 4.0 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any (OpenAL compatible)
  • Additional Notes: Steam Offline Mode - unsupported; XInput 9.1.0 for support XBox controller - Optional;
